divs: sighting detailson 5\8\12 at 8:55pm (dusk) i drove to my usual locaton to see if the lights were going to be there tonight. i only observed one diamond flasher i call it, took a few photos which i will forward to you shortly. i feel confident that you will agree, that what i am capturing is extremely interesting. i have been to this location several times and have photos to share also i have 2 other witnesses that were with me on seperate nights.we have been seeing these objects almost nigtly. on 5\4 we saw are usual flashing diamond and then saw several white objects to the right of it and lower moving almost in zigzag motions then a plane approached and it went black. my witness that night is a retired judge and he will gladly share his experience. i will forward the photos to you let me know your thoughts. if there is a logical explanation to what i'm capturing please let me know,but for now,i don't think so!!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Watkinsville
This sighting has never been favorited.
